Install Fest Components

Please ensure all steps are met prior to allowing any user to being participation in an install fest.

1. Disclaimer: MUST BE SIGNED - <nowiki>[[ SouthDakotaTeam-Events-InstallFest-Waiver | Waiver ]]</nowiki>

2. Information: Ask the user to give some prior information using this sheet. <nowiki>[[ https:--wiki.ubuntu.com-SouthDakotaTeam-Events-InstallFest?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=Information.odt | Information.odt ]]</nowiki>

3. Use the <nowiki>[[ SouthDakotaTeam-Events-InstallFest-Handbook | Handbook ]]</nowiki> to help follow a consistent approach.

4. Upload all filled out documents to our <nowiki>[[ SouthDakotaTeam-Events-InstallFest-Installed | Installed ]]</nowiki> page. This way we can keep an accurate count of who we have installed Ubuntu for and who they were.
